CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Intake_Person_Role__c, "Biological Child"), "1;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Intake_Person_Role__c, "Other Child (Not in Household)"), "2;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Intake_Person_Role__c, "Private Adoptive Child"), "3;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Intake_Person_Role__c, "Other Child"), "4;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Intake_Person_Role__c, "Non-Victim Child"), "5;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Intake_Person_Role__c, "Alleged Victim"), "6;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Intake_Person_Role__c, "Alleged Maltreator"), "7;", NULL)
CustomField.label: Role Formula
